entry.title: WIND WARNING , Charlo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 2:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: E 55 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this evening then to flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
